data.message: Facebook, I really "hate" this new format you've come with!!!!! It "STINKS!!!!!!" In particular, not being able to see what friends are online when I am.

replies.message: I had to find it too, on the bottom right corner of page click on the chat box thing and it shows who is online now
Actually, some of that is due to people turning off chat. They can be on FB doing whatever they wish, and no one else knows it, unless they happen to post/Like something.
Not liking it so much!!! Just saying!!!!!

I can still see when my friends are online just like before. The only thing that really changed is the look of FB and I like it. First time ever they have changed and I actually like it. The only thing I do not like is the Top Story feed. Once I change it to Recent Stories they need to respect that that is what I want to see and leave it alone.
I find that I am using facebook less and less since the big change!
Used to be able to see all your friends little faces and who was on-line to the left ofthe computer,...that no longer exists,...I do NOT like it,....takes up way too much space.
I really hate it!!!  New with facebook, this is not helping me learn only putting me further backward.
